Package org.opensearch.sdk

Class SDKTransportService

java.lang.Object
org.opensearch.sdk.SDKTransportService
public class SDKTransportService extends Object
Wrapper class for TransportService and associated methods. TODO: Move all the sendFooRequest() methods here TODO: Replace usages of getExtensionTransportService with this class https://github.com/opensearch-project/opensearch-sdk-java/issues/585

      public void sendRegisterTransportActionsRequest(Map<String,ActionExtension.ActionHandler<?,?>> actions)

    • sendRemoteExtensionActionRequest

      public org.opensearch.extensions.action.RemoteExtensionActionResponse sendRemoteExtensionActionRequest(RemoteExtensionActionRequest request)
      Requests that OpenSearch execute a Transport Actions on another extension.
      Parameters:
      request - The request to send
      Returns:
      A buffer serializing the response from the remote action if successful, otherwise null
